= Tools =

  * You can browse the latest source code here: http://code.google.com/p/officereader/source/browse/

= Contributing =

If you would like to submit patches, please create a new ticket and attach the patch, please use diff -upN to create it. For inclution of the patch, a [copyright agreement] must be signed first.

After several patches, read/write svn rights will be granted for direct access.
